title: Parent Engagement Strategies Institute Spring 2016
desc: The Parent Engagement Institutes are a compliant use of Tittle I funds, allocated for professional development and parental involvement, and other state and federal funds reserved for school improvement and/or parental involvement. Parent Engagement Strategies Institute? This four hour Institute will focus on helping school district and organizational staff learn about? research based strategies and best practices ? that engage parents in authentic and meaningful ways to: * Support critical academic milestones in middle school and high school * Bridge a college-going culture between home and school * Encourage communication between parents and school staff specific to student success * Create an environment for effective parent engagement to thrive within your school/organization Participants will receive ready-to-use tools and materials that will help create a plan that aligns with a schools' parent compact and/or student academic? achievement ?goals. ?
